transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Good afternoon sir. Sir main Om baat kar raha hun aapka IndiaMART ke account se.
Customer: Haanji Om ji hun.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Are actually mere ko problem aa rahi hai teen din se.
Customer: Ji ji ji. Woh Gmail se login nahi ho pa raha na sir aap bata rahe the maine abhi naam se baat.
Customer: Yahoo Yahoo ko actually kya hai verify nahi kar pa raha hai woh. OTP aa hi nahi raha.
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji.
Executive: Ji sir aap ek baar check karenge sir woh aapke spam wale usme toh nahi aa raha?
Customer: Nahi kahi pe bhi nahi aa raha sir maine pura check kar liya sir. Actually kya woh desktop mera login jo tha woh kya kehte hain mail ID woh desktop pe tha maine mobile mein bhi connect kar diya. Tab main kahi bahar se aaya toh maine waha pe bhi check kar liya kuch bhi mere ko nahi aa raha hai kahi pe bhi. Kahi OTP nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Kya reason ho raha hai?
Executive: Aapke Yahoo wale usme OTP hi nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan OTP nahi aa raha hai na sir.
Executive: Sir ek minute aap mere ko apna Yahoo wali email bata sakte hain?
Customer: Double G F double O D.
Executive: Ek minute dijiye.
Executive: Haanji sir bataiye.
Customer: Double G.
Executive: Double G.
Customer: Double G G G for Goa G for Goa.
Executive: Ji ji. G double G.
Customer: F double O D food.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Haanji G G food. T R O D U C T product.
Executive: Haanji @yahoo.com.
Customer: Haanji haanji haanji.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Yahoo dot com. Woh verify nahi kar pa raha mobile mobile number woh mobile toh verify hai.
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji sir woh mobile se toh verify ho rakha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Isme aapko nahi show kar raha hai lekin woh hai na aap ye bata rahe hain isme aapke paas OTP nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: OTP nahi aa raha toh OTP nahi aayega toh phir woh verify nahi hoga teen chaar din ho gaye is baat ko.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir.
Executive: Sir ek minute dekhiyega main na aapko apne apni personal wali email ID se ek message kar raha hun woh aapke paas receive ho raha hai kya? Ek minute dijiye mere ko bas.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi main compose kar raha hun naya mail.
Customer: Mere ko kya dusron ke mail aa rahe hain lagatar.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Dekhiye sir aapke paas woh mail jo maine abhi send kara hai woh aaya aapke paas receive hua?
Customer: Uh. Kis naam se bheja aapne?
Executive: Om Kaushik.
Customer: Om Kaushik. Are itna nahi pata hai woh.
Customer: Dusra koi mail aaya hai mere ko toh.
Executive: Maine usme check likh ke good afternoon ka message kara hai.
Customer: Uh check check likh ke bheja aapne?
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji. Good afternoon good afternoon likh ke bheja hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Customer: Haan. Hua sir aapke paas receive ye wala mail?
Customer: Haan receive ho gaya na.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji ji.
Executive: But woh OTP ka nahi aa pa raha hai aapke paas mail hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Woh wala nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir isme na abhi maine raise toh kar diya hai concern hamara jaise abhi baat kar rahe the maine aapko mail jaise aapne mere ko confirm kara na.
Customer: Haanji. Maine Om ji Om ji customer care pe call bhi kiya tha kal toh unhone koi ticket number bhi diya tha woh bhi receive ho raha hai. Mere is mail ID pe receive ticket number bhi receive hua hai sab kuch hua hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Lekin.
Executive: But OTP nahi receive ho raha.
Customer: Haan subah subah koi mail ka phone aaya tha toh unse meri baat hui thi unka main mere senior ko kehti hun baad mein wapas batati hun toh wapas koi jawab hi nahi hai unka subah se abhi tak.
Executive: Ji. Sir isme na abhi currently ek solution hum ye kar sakte hain main isko aise check kar raha hun. Hum isko main currently abhi jo hamara ye dusre wala hai na Gmail wala.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Isko primary mein kar sakte hain sir abhi hum currently.
Customer: Toh woh toh aapko hi karna padega main toh kuch nahi kar pa raha hun na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aap na jaise aap usse login bhi karte hain apne laptop mein ya kisi system mein toh aap apne phone number se login kariye usme. Number se login karne ke baad na.
Customer: Haanji. Are sir maine phone number se hi login kiya hai isko.
Executive: Ji ji ji ji. Toh ye change karne.
Customer: Phone number se login kiya tha lekin lekin uske baad mein phir ye ye ye page aa jata hai verify. Uske baad mein kuch bhi nahi hota hai. Main phir kuch bhi nahi kar pa raha hun khali verify jab tak nahi hoga tab tak kuch nahi hoga.
Customer: Total page verify verify keh raha hai.
Executive: Achha matlab ye aapse us time bhi keh raha hai mail verify karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan woh mail agar verify nahi hoga tab tak ye aapka app chalega hi nahi mera.
Executive: Ji ji ji samajh raha hun sir ek minute dijiye.
Customer: Abhi chaar din ho gaye main pareshan ho raha hun isme.
Executive: I am sorry sir ye cheez aapko face karni pad rahi hai main is cheez mein. Sir mere ko ek ek haanji. Haan maine kya kiya maine isko app ko delete mara. Aur wapas re re-store kiya app ko. Uh. App store se maine wapas app nikala. App liya aur usko login kiya wapas maine kaha ho sakta hai koi bug aa gayi hogi kuch ho gaya hoga.
Executive: Haanji. Woh bhi nahi hua sir ye wali cheez. Haan toh bhi nahi hua hai.
Customer: Woh toh wohi aa raha hai likha hua.
Executive: Ek ek minute dijiye mere ko.
Customer: Ab woh kya total system aapke wahin se ho payega mere yaha se kuch bhi nahi ho payega.
Executive: Ek minute dijiye main na maine abhi hamara account hi khola hua hai. Primary email toh hamari ye Yahoo wali hai alternate hamari Gmail wali hai. Toh ye aapke Yahoo Yahoo wali ko verify karne ke liye bol raha hai jab aap change bhi kar rahe hain.
Customer: Hmm. Nahi change mein kar raha hun toh change agar Gmail wali ko agar change kar raha hun na.
Executive: Haanji. Jaise Gmail wali dal raha hun main toh Gmail wali dal raha hun toh usme likha hua aa raha hai already used hai.
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji sir woh na pehle aapko apni ye alternate wali usme se hatana padega Gmail ko.
Customer: Ab woh main kaise hataun?
Executive: Uh sir woh jab aap edit wale option pe jayenge na.
Executive: Abhi sir abhi aap main ek cheez bataun sir sir koi option khulne tabe na.
Customer: Koi option khulne tabe na. Haanji haanji haanji. Koi option khul raha hai na koi.
Executive: Achha. Sir main ek cheez bataun agar main aapko abhi ek video meet ka link bheju aap mere ko screen share karke dikhaiyega. Main usme guide kar dunga aapse. Abhi aap join kar payenge sir?
Customer: Main actually kya market mein hun.
Executive: Haanji haanji woh piche se aawaz aa rahi thi isliye puch raha hun sir main.
Customer: Haan desktop pe nahi hun market mein hun mobile pe hun.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir aap na mobile se bhi usko mobile pe hi join kar lijiyega mere ko bas aapki screen share karke ek baar woh dekhna hai.
Customer: Haan toh woh mere ko aap guide kar dena kaise share karna hai mere ko pura knowledge bhi nahi hai jyada IT ka knowledge nahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Chalo sir. Ek minute dijiye sir mere ko main aapko bhej raha hun usme message. Uh woh location de raha hun Google Meet ka link.
Customer: Phone band karun?
Executive: Haanji sir maine na aapko bheja hai mail aap nahi ispe directly join kar lijiye usko phone se. Ek kaam kare kal kal subah kare toh?
Customer: Haanji haanji sir kal subah kar lenge koi issue nahi hai. Kal subah kitne baje ye bata de time mere ko. Aap bata dijiye sir main haanji haanji haanji. 10 baje kar lete hain sir main 9 se 10 ke beech mein kar lete hain apan.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir.
Customer: Toh 11 baje main wapas nikal jaunga out of. Thik hai thik hai thik hai koi issue nahi sir 9 se 10 ke beech mein kar lenge. Aap please mera resolve karwa dijiye.
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji sir.
Customer: Hmm. Okay. Thank you so much sir.
Executive: Okay good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to log in with Yahoo mail.

- OTP not being received on Yahoo mail.

- Wants to resolve the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive sent a test email to check mail receiving.

- Suggested making Gmail primary email.

- Offered a video meet to guide on screen sharing.

- Agreed to connect next day to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect next day to resolve.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, yahoo, gmail, login, verification
